com.game.items.armor.Armor

    • Uses of Armor in com.game.characters

      Methods in com.game.characters that return Armor 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Armor Creature.getArmor()
      Gets the currently equipped Armor or null if no Armor is currently equipped
      Armor Creature.unequipArmor()
      Removes the currently equipped Armor from the creature and puts it back into its Loot inventory.
      Methods in com.game.characters with parameters of type Armor 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Creature.equipArmor(Armor armor)
      Equips an armor from the player's inventory.
